===Noun===
{{ja-noun|おみくじ}}

# a [[random]] [[fortune]], often written on a strip of [[paper]] or on a stick of [[bamboo]], available at [[Japanese]] [[shrine]]s in exchange for a small [[offering]]

====Usage notes====
Often seen written all in [[hiragana]], in part due to the complexity and rarity of the last [[kanji]] character.
